item.title: Elite Colleges Have a Looming Money Problem
item.description: Trump policies and high costs could make coming years a financial challenge for Harvard and other Ivy League universities.

item.title: The Mega Millions jackpot is now $1 billion — but that’s not the only reason lottery sales could see a holiday spike
item.description: Christmas also fuels one form of lottery playing in particular.

item.title: Stock market’s December performance in balance as ‘Santa Claus rally’ begins
item.description: Stocks have seen a stellar 2024, but the S&P 500 is in danger of a rare December loss. It’s all riding on the so-called Santa Claus rally.

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Edges Up to 102.37
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index was little changed, edging up 0.04% to 102.37. The index was up in the past 13 trading sessions.

item.title: ‘Squid Game’ returns. Here’s what else is worth streaming from Netflix, Disney and more in December 2024.
item.description: ‘Squid Game’ is back, plus ‘Star Wars: Skeleton Crew’ and a ‘Dexter’ prequel highlight a slow month. Plus, here are the best series of the year, and r...
